price: E fizeram-Lhe parte de Seus servos. Por certo, o ser humano é um ingrato declarado.
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ لَهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ جُزۡءًاۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū lahu min ʿibādihi juz'an inna al-insāna lakafūrun mubīnun
